channel.title: Changing what port a 508 runs on?
channel.description: I am wanting to run TWO servers, so I want to change my Umairscape to run on port 43595, how could I do so?

item.title: Changing what port a 508 runs on?
item.dc:creator: @Compact Compact
item.description:
@Compact wrote:

[quote=“vic 08, post:5, topic:234871”][quote author=`umair link=topic=309727.msg2479845#msg2479845 date=1223472806]
lol =) i can see my server UmairScape =)
[/quote]
Dude, your source blows. Just shut up seriously, you can’t code worth shit… Why would you spam that here? Who cares about UmariScape… Freaking Noob[/quote]
I haven’t seen it but, is a 508 that has been from nothing but tutorials?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing what port a 508 runs on?
item.dc:creator: @ihackgames ihackgames
item.description:
@ihackgames wrote:

i know how to do it to a regular source
well try this go to server.java search the default port change that port to what ever u want save compile go on ur browser type in ur routers ip port forward to the new port
ur now hopefuly done
tell me if this helps
